Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Makes seed purchased to grow food for personal consumption exempt from sales and use taxes
Summary: Makes seed purchased to grow food for personal consumption exempt from sales and use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to granting a sales and compensating use tax exemption for the purchase of seeds to be cultivated to grow food for the purchaser's own or family consumption
